title: Job Application
name: Name
agreement: I certify that all answers given herein are true and complete to my best of my knowledge. I authorize investigation of all statements contained in this application for employment as may be necessary in arriving at an employment decision.
firstName.required: First name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.
lastName.required: Last name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.
olderThan18: You must be older than 18 years.
phoneNumber.invalid: Invalid phone number format. Please enter a valid phone number, including the country code if applicable. Examples: +1234567890, (123) 456-7890, 123-456-7890.
skillLevel.invalid: Skill level must be one of: Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced.
skills.atLeastThree: You must have at least three skills.
agreement.required: You must agree to the terms.
